eventDescription: You notice food crates scattered along the shore.
You see the remains of a lifeboat crashed on a giant rock a few miles away.
You see a large chest floating on the water. It used to belong to the ship's captain.
The wood you gathered is useless.
Roars and screams ... The woods are not safe today.
After the hurricane, walking through the woods is extremely dangerous.
An unexpected flood is destroying everything in its path.
During the night, there was a terrible hurricane.
You were lucky to find the riverbed. Unfortunately, it is bone dry!
The wind was blowing all night long, your sources are devastated.
It was a freezing cold night. You had to heat the camp.
The roar you heard during the night promises trouble...
You lose the fight for a food source.
You haven't slept well. Some of you didn't sleep at all. You had dreadful nightmares. You feel terribly tired...
Winter is approaching and predators are getting more and more dangerous...
One predator killed another. You spent the night in the safety of your camp...
Cursed island? No doubts about that.
All night long, a terrifying howl was coming from deep within the jungle.
It is not as easy a trip as you first thought.
A jaguar is rambling around the camp.
They found your camp. Nights will be hard from now on...
Predators cleaned the area. It will be hard to find food today...
The river has overflown nearby. It is dangerous for the camp.
Escape!
The wind blows with fury. Your camp is torn to pieces...
This island is not a nice place for you.
No food sources anymore. Predators have their prey...
Water enters the camp and washes things away.
Everything is wet and cold. You miss the sun...
Going outside the camp is getting more and more dangerous every day...
You can no longer work with an empty belly.
The wind blows with fury. Your camp is torn into pieces...
Dark clouds are gathering. It is going to rain. And it will be heavy rain.
When you are tired, you don't act reasonably.
You have to escape!
This can't be true...
The ocean is in a bad mood today.
The ocean is in a bad mood today.
Heavy clouds cover the sky. The weather is not helping you.
What you feared most has just happened...
You spent the night talking about your ship, your ship mates, and your future here on this dangerous island...
Late at night, a fire started in the woods.
You wake up weat and cold. It will be a hard day...
A landslide occurred during the hurricane. Your camp is on the edge of a precipice.
In the middle of the night a huge piece of wood hits the camp.
You feel like you're back in London...
In the morning, a storm spreads your weapons all over the camp, breaking many of them!
The rain wakes you up and it seems it will rain the whole day...
You have a bad feeling about this...
In the night a hurricane visited the island...
When you are tired, hungry, and scared, everything seems to fall apart.
What could be worse?
A bear finds your camp and destroys it.
It takes time to clean that mess...
You feel dizzy and collapse to the ground. You wake later with so much to do.
All night, you were talking about your future on the island. Your initial ideas will not work and your plans need to change. You will not be able to create all of the items you wanted.
In the morning, you find a dead body on the beach. It is one of your ship mates. It is not something you like to see in the morning...
The wind hits the camp again and again. Working today won't be easy.
You hear noises in the bushes near your camp. A predator is preparing to attack you soon!
A tree falls on your shelter.
You heard screaming and a loud bump during the night. In the morning, you find a wrecked balloon and 2 dead bodies.
A dreadful roar wakes you up!
It is a beautiful morning, and you wake up in a great mood. You slept well.
Insomnia.
Lightning hits a tree and starts a fire.
You all hope that it is just a temporary weakness and not something serious. You'll rest, eat, and hopefully get better...
You feel very pessimistic about your future.
Everyone eats poisonous fruits and feels sick. Perhaps you can use them for something...
You are all tired and exhausted. Late at night, you had a stupid argument. This is bad...
You don't want to go outside your camp today!
Loss of hope is the end...
Go outside the camp and start to pray...
Everything is taking longer than you expected...
You have no good clothes, no good shelter, and you are tired, hungry, cold...
You either share your food sources with the predator or you fight for them. There is no other option.
A huge part of the island is on fire...
